name: Trick or Treat Trivia Game | Thematic Fun | 10 Questions

questions.text: Name the actor who starred in such movies as "Hair" and "Prince of the City".
questions.explanation:
Treat Williams.

	Born as Richard Treat Williams, his first movie role was in 1975 in "Deadly Hero" which starred James Earl Jones.

questions.text: In what movie did George Segal play Morris Brummel?
questions.correct: No Way to Treat a Lady
questions.explanation:
No Way to Treat a Lady.

	This 1968 Drama/Comedy starred Rod Steiger as a crazed lady killer and George Segal as the detective trying to track him down.

questions.text: What movie was a sequel to "The Rocky Horror Picture Show"?
questions.explanation:
Shock Treatment.

	The movie was released in 1981 and told the tale of Brad and Janet appearing on numerous quiz shows.  The roles of Brad and Janet were played by Cliff de Young and Jessica Harper.

questions.text:
Complete the lyrics "Did a shadow of emotion cross your face 
Or was it just another...
questions.explanation:
Trick of the light.

	"Trick of the Light" was released by The Who on the "Who are You?" album.  Written by the late great bass player for The Who John Entwistle.

questions.text: Ozzy Osbourne appeared in the movie "Trick or Treat".
questions.explanation:
True.

	Ozzy portrayed (of all characters!) a Reverend in this 1986 campy horror movie in which Gene Simmons of Kiss also appeared.

questions.text: What did the cartoon character, Felix the Cat always have with him?
questions.explanation:
Bag of Tricks.

	Felix the Cat first appearance was in 1919 in "Feline Follies".

questions.text: What rock group released the album "Trick of the Tail"?
questions.explanation:
Genesis.

	"Trick of the Tail" was released in 1976 and contains great songs such as "Dance of a Volcano", "Ripples" as well as the title track.

questions.text: What Paul Simon album included the hits "Late in the Evening", "Ace in the Hole" and the title track?
questions.explanation:
One Trick Pony.

	The album released in 1980 and was produced by Paul Simon and Phil Ramone. The movie "One Trick Pony" was released the same year as the album.

questions.text: Who is thought to have been the first ones to "Trick or Treat?"
questions.explanation:
The Druids.

	Supposedly, the Druids began knocking at peoples asking for food (or human sacrifice in some cases!).  When they were given the food (or sacrifice) it was a "treat".  If they were refused the food (or sacrifice) the person or persons who refused them would be cursed and that would be the "trick".

questions.text: What group had a hit with "I Want You to Want Me"?
questions.explanation:
Cheap Trick.

	Cheap Trick released their first album in 1977.  "I Want You to Want Me" was their first U.S. top 10 hit.
